Package com.group10.CI

Class HistoryHandler

java.lang.Object
com.group10.CI.HistoryHandler
public class HistoryHandler
extends Object
Class for managing writing and fetching info from files
Author:
Bror Sebastian Sjovald

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected String historyFolderPath  
    protected String repoHistoryFolder  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    HistoryHandler​(String repoName)
    A constructor which initializes where history is being saved, by adding the repoName the server can save several build histories in different folders.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    String getHistory​(String commitId)
    Method getHistory fetches the content of the file located at repoHistoryFolder/commitId.txt and returns it as a string.
    void saveHistory​(String commitId, String message)
    saveHistory writes the CI status message to a file located at repoHistoryFolder/commitId.txt.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • historyFolderPath

      protected final String historyFolderPath
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • repoHistoryFolder

      protected String repoHistoryFolder

  • Constructor Details

    • HistoryHandler

      public HistoryHandler​(String repoName)
      A constructor which initializes where history is being saved, by adding the repoName the server can save several build histories in different folders.
      Parameters:
      repoName - The name of the repository tested

  • Method Details

    • saveHistory

      public void saveHistory​(String commitId, String message) throws IOException
      saveHistory writes the CI status message to a file located at repoHistoryFolder/commitId.txt. The message needs to be encoded as a string.
      Parameters:
      commitId - The commit id related to the build info
      message - Status of the build
      Throws:
      IOException - When there is an error writing to the file

    • getHistory

      public String getHistory​(String commitId) throws FileNotFoundException
      Method getHistory fetches the content of the file located at repoHistoryFolder/commitId.txt and returns it as a string.
      Parameters:
      commitId - The commit id related to the build info
      Returns:
      Returns the build info of given commit id
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - When there is no build info file
